org.daisy.pipeline.job

Interface Job

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJob

    public interface Job
extends Runnable, AutoCloseable
    The Class Job defines the execution unit.

      • close

        void close()
        Close the job. Will clean up any resources associated with the job and will make it impossible to call any methods on it. Call this method before discarding the job. This method should not be called when the job is managed by a JobManager.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
